_comment: getBulkAircraftExportPaged -- full aircraft records with company data (always use paged)

response.responsestatus: SUCCESS: AC Count: 1 Comp Count: 9 Cont Count: 9 Phone Count: 15

notes: responsestatus includes record counts: 'SUCCESS: AC Count: N Comp Count: N Cont Count: N'
ALWAYS use the paged variant -- getBulkAircraftExport (non-paged) will timeout on large datasets
actiondate filter is critical for incremental sync -- only pull records changed since last run
forsale in this response is 'N'/'Y' string (different from getAircraftList which uses 'true'/'false')
